name: Video Notes MCP
description: A Model Context Protocol server for managing video notes

tools.name: search_notes
tools.description: Search through video notes. This tool allows you to find notes containing specific keywords or phrases. It returns a list of matching notes with their titles and content.

query.description: The search query to find relevant notes. Can be a keyword, phrase, or topic.

tools.name: get_note
tools.description: Retrieve a specific note by its ID. This tool fetches the complete content of a single note, including its title, content, and metadata.

id.description: The unique identifier of the note to retrieve.

tools.name: create_note
tools.description: Create a new note in the system. This tool allows you to add a new note with a title and content. The note will be stored and can be retrieved later.

title.description: The title of the new note. Should be descriptive and concise.

content.description: The main content of the note. Can include multiple paragraphs, code snippets, or other formatted text.
